articles.title: New Drug Combination Found to Slow One of the Deadliest Forms of Prostate Cancer - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A targeted drug combination delays advanced prostate cancer in men with specific DNA repair gene mutations. A large international study led by researchers at UCL has found that a new combination of drugs may substantially slow the progression of an advanced a…
articles.content:
A new targeted drug combination has shown striking potential to delay advanced prostate cancer in men with key genetic mutations, suggesting a new era of personalized treatment. Credit: Stock
